title: Countdown to World Blockchain Summit Dubai 2023 Begins!
description: Dubai is paving the way for a Web3 future by implementing a robust regulatory framework for digital assets and offering commercial licenses for Web3 projects.  {Dubai, 25 October, 2023}: The countdown has begun as the World Blockchain Summit returns, scheduled for November 1st-2nd, 2023, at the Address Dubai Marina, hosted by Trescon. This highly anticipated ... Read more

title: Exploring the Effects: Australia’s New Ban on Credit Card Use in Bitcoin gambling
description: Australia has strict rules and legal frameworks guiding the use of crypto and operations of the Bitcoin gambling industry. The country’s legal officials recognize the opportunities and risks of this emerging innovation in the gambling industry and set up rules to manage it.  Recently, early in September, the Albanese Labor Government proposed a gambling Bill ...
